Text:
Thanks a lot .) Very useful collection.
Do you have any video like collonial gunsmith about hand forging of muzzle loader barrel?

Sorry, no. 

I saw such machines at the NRA's museum in Virginia, and then I looked for such material for a long time. The problems are (1) the teaching at that time was hands-on, not book-based (2) everyone had their own style, so even if you find a great how-to book, it refers to other tools the guy made himself.

So, I suggest you leap-frog to modern weapons made with antique means.

Anybody know where I can find the missing "Firearms Assembly Disassembly - Part 5 - is not here.txt"?  It's actually "The Gun Digest Book of Firearms Assembly/Disassembly, Pt. V: Shotguns"

Ive looked around and cant seem to find a legit copy.  :(

Thanks karm123 for the upload. Please keep seeding guys. When we seed large files like this we also acknowledge the uploader for their donation to the PB community. I have a ratio on the Star Trek complete set of over 100:1 now!
